A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Worst Star Wars movie in the saga. Let's take some Star Wars characters and try to do a remake of Battlestar Galactica. No world building\, no compelling new characters\, a lousy plot\, terrible dialogue. \n\nLet's take the baddest Jedi of them all and turn him into a pussy. It pains me to say this but this movie was terrible.
